prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that rides on a majestic steed with vibrant blue and green colors.
Show me a small, elegant Pokemon with a unique crown and a shimmering aura.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of nature with a mystical appearance.
Generate a graceful bipedal Pokemon with ice-like features and a regal demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that has a blend of earthy tones and an ethereal presence.
Design a majestic Pokemon that represents the cycle of seasons with a vibrant color palette.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a king of the forest, complete with a crown and a staff.
